message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
